{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Roku |model=HD |revision=(2000C) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U89X011 |manuf_rev=.04 |availability=now |type=media player, media streamer |fcc_id=TC22000C |fcc_date=09/02/2010 |ic_id=5959A-2000C |flags=HDMI |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=NXP |cpu1_model=PNX­8935 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1208UDC-PCB0 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4H51083 |ram1_num=4 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43231 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |802dot11_protocols=bg }} {{TagLine|Streaming Media Player}} :[[wikipedia:Roku|'''Roku''' on Wikipedia]] :[http://support.roku.com/entries/20345913-Product-Comparison-All-Roku-Player-Models Product Comparison All Roku Player Models]
[[Roku HD v2 Wireless Module]] *The second generation [[Roku HD]] is a Netflix/Pandora/MLB TV streaming device with :built-in b/g WiFi according to Roku, but the FCC photos show a b/g/n capable chipset. <small> *They may just be the wrong photos though since they are identical to the photos for the [[Roku XD]]. :Unlike the previous generation of Roku devices, the second generation [[Roku HD]] now holds the wireless :components on the main board along with two U.FL connectors in addition to two onboard antennas. </small> ===FCC Info=== *[[Roku HD (2000C)]] :CPU: [[NXP]] PNX­8935 @400MHz (Nexperia Semi/Trident MS) :WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43231KFBG (2T2R 802.11bgn 300Mbps) :RAM: 4x [[Samsung]] K4H51083 (4x 64MB) 256MB (SDRAM DDR) :Flash: [[Samsung]] K9F1208UDC-PCB0 64MB (NAND TSOP-48)
[https://fccid.io/TC22000C/Label/Label-1337031 '''FCC Label'''] *[[Roku]] ''Pico Slimline HD'' - [[Foxconn]] U89X011.02 (J) *[[Roku]] ''Pico Slimline HD-XR'' - [[Foxconn]] U89X011.03 (K) *[[Roku HD (2000C)]] - [[Roku]] ''Pico HD Classic'' - [[Foxconn]] U89X011.04 (H) *[[Roku HD XR (N1101)]] - ''[[Roku]] Redwood STB'' - [[Foxconn]] U89X005.00 (D) :Flash: 256MB (NAND), USB Ports (Hub), 802.11bgn *[[Roku HD (N1100)]] - ''[[Roku]] Redwood STB'' - [[Foxconn]] U89X005.01 (C) :Flash: 64MB (NAND), 802.11bg *[[Roku SD (N1050)]] - ''[[Roku]] Redwood STB'' - [[Foxconn]] U89X005.02 (G) :Only Composite Video Output *[[Roku DVP (N1000)]] - ''[[Roku]] STB'' - [[Foxconn]] :Composite Video/Audio Output, Ethernet, HDMI, Component, SPDIF
